Package io.micronaut.oraclecloud.atp.jdbc.ucp

Class UcpPoolConfigurationListener

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.oraclecloud.atp.jdbc.ucp.UcpPoolConfigurationListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.micronaut.context.event.BeanInitializedEventListener<io.micronaut.configuration.jdbc.ucp.DatasourceConfiguration>, io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered, EventListener
@Singleton @Requires(classes=oracle.ucp.jdbc.PoolDataSource.class) @Internal public class UcpPoolConfigurationListener extends Object implements io.micronaut.context.event.BeanInitializedEventListener<io.micronaut.configuration.jdbc.ucp.DatasourceConfiguration>, io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered
UCP connection pool listener that downloads oracle wallet and configures the PoolDataSource.
Since:
2.5
Author:
Pavol Gressa
